scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/kpmgsites/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/kpmg
  set jcr:title{String} to "KPMG.com"
 set dam:disableImageSmartTag{Boolean} to true
 set dam:disableTextSmartTag{Boolean} to true
 set dam:disableColorExtraction{Boolean} to true
 set dam:disableVideoSmartTag{Boolean} to true
 set imageProfile{String} to "/conf/global/settings/dam/adminui-extension/imageprofile/KPMG-Smart-Crop-Profile"
 end
